title: 如何评价美国众议院最新投票通过的要求企业公开实际持有人的法案？
contents:
突发新闻：美国民主党领衔的众议院刚刚投票通过一个法案，在美国注册的企业一定要公开所有真正的拥有人。


via Twitter @greggiroux

U.S. House voted 249-173 for bill that would require corporations and limited liability companies to reveal their true owners to the Treasury Department's Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) upon formation.

D 224-5
R 25-167

How all House members voted on the bill, called the "Corporate Transparency Act": https://t.co/DAD3U0BEDc

Liz Cheney, Francis Rooney, Stefanik, Upton among the 25 Rs voting Y

5 Ds N: Texans Cuellar & V. Gonzalez + Trump-district Ds Brindisi (NY), Peterson (PA), Van Drew (NJ)
I 0-1
